pullRequest.title: [doc] Update ruleset examples for ant
pullRequest.bodyText:
Before submitting a PR, please check that:

 The PR is submitted against master. The PMD team will merge back to support branches as needed.
 ./mvnw clean verify passes. This will build and test PMD, execute PMD and checkstyle rules. Check this for more info

PR Description:
Avoid:
Use Rule name category/java/bestpractices.xml/ConstantsInInterface
instead of the deprecated Rule name rulesets/java/design.xml/ConstantsInInterface.
PMD 7.0.0 will remove support for this deprecated Rule name usage.

Doc page, that is being updated:
https://pmd.github.io/latest/pmd_userdocs_tools_ant.html

nodes.bodyText: We don't recommend including whole categories though. The recommended starting point is rulesets/java/quickstart.xml

-            <ruleset>rulesets/java/design.xml</ruleset>

@@ -57,7 +57,7 @@ The examples below won't repeat this taskdef element, as this is always required rulesetfiles - A comma delimited list of ruleset files ('rulesets/java/basic.xml,rulesets/java/design.xml'). + A comma delimited list of ruleset files ('category/java/bestpractices.xml,category/java/design.xml').

commit.message:
Replace deprecated rulesets/...

Avoid:
Use Rule name category/java/bestpractices.xml/ConstantsInInterface instead of the deprecated Rule name rulesets/java/design.xml/ConstantsInInterface. PMD 7.0.0 will remove support for this deprecated Rule name usage.
